Sergio Marchionne 's statement said.`` I regret the remark, which I consider inappropriate.'' Sergio Marchionne said Chrysler remains grateful for the bailouts and noted that no other parties were willing to assist in Chrysler's recovery. The two governments levied interest rates that, although appropriate at the time, are above current market conditions, he continued.`` This was done with the full support and understanding of the members of Chrysler Group LLC.'' Chrysler hopes to reach a deal with banks by the end of March to refinance the loans,

David Letterman did a comedy bit many, many years ago called`` cause and effect,'' or something like that. We recall one of David Letterman 's jokes went like this: Cause: Millions of prairie dogs die of a mysterious disease.`` Effect: McRibs for a limited time. Anyway, that came to mind when we first heard about the documentary Return of the Prairie Bandit, which airs Thursday, Feb. 10 as part of The Nature of Things with David Suzuki on CBC.
